    • Method Detail

      • configureAggregations

        public int configureAggregations(int time_series_id,
                                 java.time.OffsetDateTime start_time,
                                 java.time.OffsetDateTime end_time,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> aggregation_types,
                                 int values_number,
                                 fr.ubo.fast.common.model.Scale scale)
        Configure a time series with a list of aggregations and a scale (list of zoom levels). For each aggregation type and each interval (zoom level / values_number), a pre-computed table is created and a row is inserted into the configurations table.
        Specified by:
        configureAggregations in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        time_series_id - Time series ID.
        start_time - Start time of the time window.
        end_time - End time of the time window.
        aggregation_types - List of aggregations.
        values_number - Number of values (buckets) to return.
        scale - List of zoom levels.
        Returns:
        0 if failure, 1 if success.
